name: Ira Baldwin
text: Good food quick and easy, they often have good deals as well. Seems like with the online ordering system they have in place it can cause quite a bit of confusion and frustration with customers in line trying to place a order as walk-in. ‚Ä¶More

text: Food quality was fine, but they mixed up my order on two separate occasions.  This wouldn't have been a big deal, but the management's approach and demeanor prompted this review.  Her curt and  condescending tone was extremely insulting and ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew 32
text: Customer service was okay. Prices are good. Amount of toppings they put on are good. But the reason for only 2 stars is because of the taste of their pizzas and garlic cheese bread. They clearly use very cheap ingredients for their pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: Susan Garland
text: Great fresh toppings. One of the best pizza places in town. Worth taking home to bake. They even have Salads & Dessert Pizzas. They also take Food Stamps for everything they sell except the Pizza Cutters.

name: Caryn Simmons
text: Lady at the counter was so rude.  She wouldnt honor my loyalty card.  I walked out and will never come back to this location.

name: Jessica Lloyd
text: Love the many selection options and fast & friendly staff

name: Jeremy Sanderson
text: Always have had great luck with service and food here.

name: Mike Fleckenstein
text: We love their pizzas, unique menu and friendly service. Oftentimes only 1 person working even when busy. It's great to watch someone who's good at what they do and enjoys doing it.

name: Heather Riley
text: Love this concept and the fresh ingredients. One of my favorite pizzas!

text: Nice employees now.  Were critically understaffed recently.

text: I like it! Made fresh right in front of you. Take and bake!

name: Denise Negrea
text: This is an excellent pizza chain and very reasonably priced . I love baking the pizzas at home, and they are less greasy and much more tasty than other pizza chains. It's really not like takeout pizza at all. Plus, very friendly and helpful staff.
